content.raw:
Just realized that I was thinking along a slightly different direction than you. You're concerned about people using the `gazebo::math` library directly, and I was concerned about people using the gazebo api that happen to return or use math components.

I think it would be best for us to mark all the gazebo math functions as deprecated, with instructions to use ignition math instead. 

Then the plan would be:

gazebo6: `gazebo::math` marked as deprecated, and all gazebo functions that use `gazebo::math` will have transition functions to use `ignition::math`
gazebo7: We could switch completely at this point to `igntion::math`. All transition functions that have the `Ign` suffix will become deprecated.
gazebo8: Remove the `Ign` suffixes.
